justification: "Subject's gazes were recorded at 500 Hz with an EyeLink-1000 … eye tracker," indicating that eye gaze/visual attention was captured by this specific instrument.
"Participants rated 180 food items for healthiness … on a continuous scale with the anchors ‑5 (bad) to 5 (good)," showing that healthiness judgments were obtained via this rating scale.
The same sentence notes that items were also rated for "tastiness on a continuous scale with the anchors ‑5 (bad) to 5 (good)," so tastiness was measured with that scale.

"In the second phase … participants performed a certainty equivalence (CE) elicitation task … The CE was calculated as the mean between the two amounts of money where the subject switches from choosing the sure amount to choosing the gamble," demonstrating that subjective value was measured via the CE task.
